bike.description: P. Series double-butted Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo 21" TT, externally relieved MID BB shell and integrated headset, removable seatstay-mounted U-brake bosses, 5mm 3D dropouts for 14mm axle, integrated chain tensioner and hardware
